com.varmateo.yawg.util

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.varmateo.yawg.util.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends Object
    Utility functions for managing files and directories.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FileUtils.ConsumerWithIOException<T>
      Similar to a java.util.function.Consumer but throws IOException.
      static interface  FileUtils.FunctionWithIOException<T,R> 
      static interface  FileUtils.SupplierWithIOException<T>

    • Method Detail

      • basename

        public static String basename(Path path)
        Determines the basename of the given file.

        The basename is the name of the file without extension.

        Parameters:
        path - The path of the file for which the basename will be determined.
        Returns:
        The basename of the given file.

      • isNameMatch

        public static boolean isNameMatch(Path path,
                                  Pattern pattern)

      • copy

        public static void copy(Path source,
                        Path target)
                 throws IOException
        Copies one file to a given location.

        If the target file already exists, itl will be overwritten

        Parameters:
        source - The path of the source file to be copied.
        target - The path of the target file to be created. Its parent directory is supposed to exist.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there were problems reading from the source file, or writing to the target file.

      • safeCopy

        public static io.vavr.control.Try<Void> safeCopy(Path source,
                                                 Path target)

      • readAsString

        public static String readAsString(Path sourcePath)
                           throws IOException
        Reads the contents of a file into a string.

        The file is expected to be UTF-8 encoded.

        Parameters:
        sourcePath - The file to be read.
        Returns:
        The contents of the given file as a string.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there were any problems reading the file.

      • writeTo

        public static void writeTo(Path target,
                           FileUtils.ConsumerWithIOException<Writer> consumer)
                    throws IOException
        Creates a new Writer and passes it to the given consumer.

        The Writer passed to the consumer is a buffered writer with UTF-8 pointing to the given target file. The Writer is ensured to be closed when this method returns.

        Parameters:
        target - The file to be written.
        consumer - The consumer that is suppoed to write into the Writer associated with the given target file.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there were problems opening the file for writing, or writing into the file.

      • safeWriteTo

        public static <T> io.vavr.control.Try<Void> safeWriteTo(Path target,
                                                        FileUtils.ConsumerWithIOException<Writer> action)

      • safeWriteWith

        public static <T> io.vavr.control.Try<T> safeWriteWith(Path target,
                                                       FileUtils.FunctionWithIOException<Writer,T> action)

        public static <T> T readFrom(Path source,
                             FileUtils.FunctionWithIOException<Reader,T> transformer)
                      throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
